storyInfo: Grain Buds and He Sheng see strange visions while investigating the pollution in the fields. A mysterious trainee Tianshi asks Grain Buds to collect some unusually shaped rice for her.

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Duoxie, thank you so much.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: I was transporting rare ore from the north and selling it in the south when I got waylaid. You really saved my hide there.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: You shouldn't be traveling by side trails.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei
Caravan Leader
attributes.content: It was because we were in a hurry...

attributes.name: Caravan Leader
attributes.content: Anyway, thank you very much for your help. Please, accept this token of my appreciation.
Not interested. Bye.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Sir... sir!
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: I assume you're a martial artist of some renown...? That you walk in jianghu?
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: Do you want to spar?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Ah, that's not for a meek merchant like me.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: But if you're a martial artist... as a matter of fact, I came across a rare tome on kung fu in the course of my travels. I think you might be interested.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: What use do I have for kung fu books? Don't make me laugh.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: How about just a look? I never sell anything my customers don't need.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: I'll pass.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Just one look. It won't take much of your time. I promise, you won't regret it.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: Enough is eno—
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Your skills have advanced beyond my wildest dreams.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I am no longer a match for you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's you...
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: If I beat you, will that make me the First Under Heaven?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You are already the First Under Heaven.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The First... I'm the First Under Heaven?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: His heart feels like it is boiling. His fists still feel warm.
He has reached the summit, he has done what he sought to do all his life.
Wait, no.
Who is this man?
He feels dazed.
...What's going on?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Like I said, a humble merchant.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: I buy and sell everything.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: How did he find me?
Why me?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I know you've trained for forty years with one opponent in mind.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: You have the chance to close the gap by a few decades. Are you not interested?
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: I don't need your help!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Maybe you don't want anything from me, but you have something I want.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: I heard you recently came into possession of a certain sword. Name your price. What can I offer you for it?
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: Get lost!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: What the—
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: It appears you're not satisfied with my offer.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: Now, now, there's no need to be hasty. There's room for negotiation.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: There's nothing to negotiate!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You honored the sword, and you honored our promise. I knew my oath-brother could be trusted.
attributes.name: Liang Xun?

attributes.content: Forty years in search of the peak of kung fu perfection.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Is there no price you would pay to reach that peak?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Enough of your tricks!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Dad?
attributes.name: Waai Fu?

attributes.content: Ah, yes. Everything is for sale. It's just about putting the right price on it.
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: How about... the life of your daughter?
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: Weiwei! This is a construction site. You can't enter without permission.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Long time no see, Nian.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Did you make all this? Very impressive.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Skip the flattery. What do you want?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Aw, it's been so long since we last saw each other and this is how you greet me?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Where would you have found the funding for your little toy, if I wasn't hard at work north and south, paying taxes on my hard-earned income?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: You think I don't know where your money comes from? Speculation and inflated prices, not to mention you're not the one who made all that stuff.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: There's a reason traders like you weren't respected in the old days.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What are you doing here? I thought you would go to see Shu first.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Just curious about this thing they say will let our family live in peace and comfort forever and ever.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Heard you ran into a bit of trouble. Need a hand?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: If I did it, wouldn't be yours. What do you know about engineering?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I could help a little with Shu's side.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: What are you planning?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I know that this energy core is more than just a construction project. It must be given the concept of 'life' in order for it to become the conceptual 'Feranmut' that enables our continued existence.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: That's why you need our big sister's powers, but she already has so much to deal with here.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I've learned a trick or two from her. Wouldn't it be more efficient for me to take over?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: So you care about her, after all... I thought you two had a split.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Perish the thought...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Can I take that as a yes?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: No, hold it right there.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Go back where you came from, and I'll pretend I never saw you today.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ai, my sisters really don't want to see me?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I'm just on guard against your bag of tricks. Don't wanna fall into your trap.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wouldn't be the first time you cheated me out of something.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I was just helping you sell some of your things. You always got your fair cut.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Just stop. I don't have time for your smooth talking.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Go away, far away from my project. The last thing I need is even more complaining from the old men.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What if I really wanted to go and see?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: ...Wei.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't get so excited. Do I look like the kind of man who would steal from my little sister?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I'm just here to see my sisters. I'm glad you're all still alive and kicking.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Saw him once, and that was it...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Where did he go?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Wei.
Hraaagh––
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: (Bite)
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: You—!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Dusk?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What's the matter? Not quite as spirited as the last time I saw you, eh?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You should not abuse your proxy powers like that...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ah, give it a rest.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Did you think I would have come looking for the Sui Regulator if I didn't really, absolutely, definitely have to?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: So he already found you.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What are you planning?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Why did he suddenly return to Dahuang, just as work on the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities is beginning?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Why are you asking me? Aren't you the Candleholder?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I'll get to the bottom if it, of course...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And where do you intend to start?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I suspect there was someone behind the previous disaster... with the construction of the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities looming, the offender may be in hiding nearby.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And what is a lone Candleholder going to do without help?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I'm not the only one the Sui Regulator has in Dahuang.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Then you can keep following the lead of others, completely oblivious to what's going on, just like you always do.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Looks like taking off that uniform has cleared your eyes a bit. Maybe there's hope for you yet.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I don't need your advice...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I don't like to deal with calculating types. I'm going to say this once, and only once.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The needle prick is smart. Very smart. He's not going to leave a trail for you to find. And you people know that, having been on his case for so many years.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Brute force is more effective when dealing with someone like that.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Force?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: A picture scroll?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What do you think you can do on your own, even if you somehow catch him in the act?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: This will at least keep his feet tied for a while.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: It's a major violation of regulations for a Candleholder to have private contact with a proxy, never mind borrowing her power...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's your choice.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You'd help me?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I've said enough. The ball is in your court now.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: ...Duoxie.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So you came here to play and saw me sleeping by the river?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: But that doesn't make sense! Why would I still have flowers that I picked in a dream? My leg hurts too.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Leg cramps while dreaming means you're growing taller. Congrats. Yay.
attributes.name: Annoyed Girl

attributes.content: Hmph, you haven't grown an inch these past few years. The only thing that's gotten bigger is your voice.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: And you sneaked out of class, didn't you?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Shh, keep it down!
attributes.name: Annoyed Girl

attributes.content: I knew it!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Are you really a student at the Tianshi Bureaus? Why do I always see you outside?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: If I'm not at school, it means I have something more important to do than sit in school. None of your business.
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: I won't tell anyone you sneaked out of class if you don't tell anyone I came to the riverside. Deal?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Where's my fan? Give it back.
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: How did you know—
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Pff, so mean.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I already gave you your flute. What do you want?
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: You just cobbled it together from some bamboo lying around, and you only gave it to me after you were done playing it.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Cobbled it together?! You—
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: Listen to the sound! Look at the texture! Do you know how hard it was to give it away? Give it back, if you don't want it!
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: ...It's that nice?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Alright, you can have your fan back. But we're keeping this a secret.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: That's more like it...
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: Here, it's this stalk of rice.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: See how pretty the red color is? It's the only one alive here. Is it some kind of new species?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Hey, why did you pull it out?!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: My homework.
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: Do you know where else something like this grows? Any kind of crop will do, any that's pretty like this. Don't tell anyone, just let me know. I'll come and take a little bit.
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: Isn't that cheating?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: And don't pick it yourself. Don't want you damaging it. Tell me and I'll come. Don't tell anyone else.
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: Fine, fine, just keep my name out of it, if the Tianshis catch you.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You worry about that time you gave the test stockbeasts diarrhea with the wrong feed.
attributes.name: Annoyed Apprentice Tianshi

attributes.content: You—!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.text: Dahuang is big, very big. It takes a whole day to walk from the east end to the west end. And you'll break your leg before you walk a full circle around its farmlands.
But Laoshi says Dahuang isn't big enough to feed everyone.
I've never been outside Dahuang. This is the northern border of Yan, with only rough roads through the mountains and rivers. The food produced here is the only link to the world outside.
The weight of the grain on the stalks in summer and autumn is the weight of the land. There is no sight like the sight of farmland during a bumper harvest.

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: An old farmer stands in the fields. Her facial features are unclear. There are tiny flowers in her hair.
Er... hello?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: A hoe?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Till the earth.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: Loosen the soil, plant the seeds, and let them grow.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: Plough with focus.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: The youth takes the hoe. The old farmer turns around and bends down to work the soil again.
The hoe is heavy. He raises it up high.
Then, he brings it down onto the earth.
Thump.
A rice seedling buds from the loosened soil. It grows rapidly, and soon flowers begin to bloom from its stalks.
The youth feels a strange sense of fatigue. He wipes the sweat from his forehead and raises the hoe again.
Thump.
In the blink of an eye, the blooming flowers fall, and grains start to fill the stalks.
The rice has borne grain. It should be ready for harvest soon.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The hoe seems to be getting heavier and heavier. He looks at his hand. Thick callouses have formed, and his arms and shoulders have grown creased and wrinkled.
The old farmer says nothing and continues to work the soil.
A seedling emerges from the earth, in the shadow of a patch of rice.
Thump.
Life, then death. Golden rice grains fall from the stalks, then fields after fields of crops fall lifeless onto the earth.
The youth freezes, just before he brings the hoe down, staring at the scene before him in shock.
Old timer... what happened to the rice...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: ...*cough* *cough...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: From spring to autumn, one harvest to the next.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: What is a season to you, young man?
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: Reaping the fruit? Filling your belly? Planting the next batch of seeds?
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: The youth lifts the hoe and brings down on the earth again and again.
The rice seeds take root and sprout underneath his feet, blossoming and bearing grain, before wilting and returning to dust. He never gets the chance to hold the seeds in his hands.
He feels his strength fade. His hair grows rampant, from black and strong to soft and fragile, and his clothes rip and tatter, hanging on the back that he could no longer keep straight.
He brings the hoe down one last time, not having the strength to do it again. A knot of white hair drops down by his face.
I spent all my life farming here, but life is too short.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: Hundreds, thousands, tens of thousands... numbers that are too big for me.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: ...I'm old?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He is standing on shambles.
I will never see them grow up. I don't have the time to wait for them to bear fruit.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: It is beyond my lifespan.
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: The old farmer plants a tree on the levee and caresses the tree trunk, before disappearing into thin air.
Tree after tree appears on the levee. There are strands of red silk tied to them, wooded placards hanging off the silk, but the writing on the placards are too blurry for He Sheng to read.
Wind causes the forest to rustle.
What are those placards?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Why can't we keep the crops we grow from the earth?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Broken rice grains lie on the ground.
What did you see, young man?
attributes.name: Old Farmer

attributes.content: Why... why don't I see the fruit?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He lifts the hoe again, bringing it down, wilting and growing old with each swing.
He pours his life into the earth so that it may nourish the crops, but the crops do not respond. They grow and wilt without leaving seed.
His long, white hair covers him like dried grass.
Does any of this really mean anything?
attributes.name: Old Farmer?

attributes.content: His back is hunched. The pain of age spreads across his back. Weakness has robbed him of the strength to speak. He can only mumble meaningless sounds.
He casts his cloudy eyes to the ground, where patches of rice seedlings lie.
Who... will see the day?
attributes.name: Old Farmer?

attributes.content: He Sheng turns around.
A white figure stands behind him, her long hair like an ancient old tree, blue as the river.
The figure waves her sleeves, and the rice starts to grow rapidly.
Before long, all He Sheng can see is growing rice.
The figure begins to stride, and everything is silent.
He Sheng!
He Sheng? He Sheng! Wake up!
attributes.name: Zuo Le
